query:
UPDATE game_rooms
        SET players = (
            SELECT jsonb_agg(
                CASE
                    WHEN (elem->>'user_id')::BIGINT = $2
                    THEN jsonb_set(elem, '{is_ready}', $3::TEXT::JSONB)
                    ELSE elem
                END
            )
            FROM jsonb_array_elements(players) AS elem
        )
        WHERE room_id = $1
